## Request for Information - Security Guard Services
### Solicitation Number: 21-175998
#### Publication Date: April 24, 2024
#### Tender Closing Date: July 24, 2024, 14:00:00 (Local Time)
### Overview
Global Affairs Canada (GAC) is inviting interested bidders to participate in a Request for Information (RFI) for Security Guard Services. This RFI aims to solicit information from potential bidders who may be interested in providing these services.

### Background
GAC currently has 104 protective services contracts in place, providing services to 127 missions worldwide. Typically, these requirements are re-solicited every five years through a traditional competitive process. The collected information will assist GAC in becoming a more informed buyer of protective services globally.

### Scope of Work
The scope of the RFI includes providing security services to GAC missions around the world. Interested bidders are encouraged to provide information on their ability to meet these requirements, including but not limited to:

* Provision of security personnel
* Security equipment and supplies
* Training and qualifications
* Experience in providing similar services to government organizations

### How to Respond
To participate in this RFI, please submit your responses to the following contact information:

* Wayne Dubeau
* Email: internationalproposals@international.gc.ca
* Contact Number: (000) 000-0000
* Address: 125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0G2

Please submit your responses in English or French. Responses should be clearly labeled with the solicitation number (21-175998) and must be received by the tender closing date.

### Attachments
The RFI package, including the attachment and solicitation documents, can be accessed at the following link:
[Exemption still stands? Attachment hyperlink]

### Note
GAC reserves the right to request additional information from interested bidders and to consider all responses received in response to this RFI.
